class.name: single_threaded
class.purpose: Single-threaded choice for the ThreadingModel template parameter of a signal.

description.para: The single_threaded class will produce a multi-thread-unsafe signal class when used as the signal's ThreadingModel template parameter. The signal might still be used in a multi-threaded program, as long as the signal is only used by a single thread. The signal may have slightly better performance that a thread-safe signal, since it performs no locking.
